name: Pixel RPG (maskedpiss)
description:
This is a little project I'm using to teach myself the fundamentals of game development. It's a remake of one of my favorite childhood flash games: Stick RPG. It is extremely barebones right now as I lay the ground work and get systems working. Updates every Saturday until it's done!

Controls: WASD to move, ESC to pause, left click for everything else
